entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫349,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Quarterly MembershipÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Lifetime - EducationÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÂçáÁ∫ßÁªàË∫´‰ºöÂëòÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Yearly MembershipÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Monthly MembershipÔºö‚Ç∫19,99
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • ÊúàÂ∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö‚Ç∫349,99

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Subnautica
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

Application Description

*Make sure to check if your device is supported before playing Subnautica!* Subnautica is an underwater adventure game set on an alien ocean planet. A massive, open world full of wonder and peril awaits you! Descend into the depths, craft equipment, pilot submarines and out-smart wildlife to explore lush coral reefs, volcanoes, cave systems, and more - all while trying to survive. Unravel the mystery of this world teeming with creatures, both friendly and hostile, scattered with clues from a previous time. Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. FEATURES ‚Ä¢ SURVIVE - After crash landing on a vast underwater planet, the clock is ticking to find water, food, and to develop the equipment you need to explore. ‚Ä¢ EXPLORE - Manage your hunger, thirst, and oxygen supply as you dive into towering kelp forests, sunlit plateaus, bio-luminescent reefs, and winding cave systems. ‚Ä¢ SCAVENGE - Collect resources from the ocean around you. Venture deeper and further to find rarer resources, allowing you to craft more advanced items. ‚Ä¢ CRAFT - Build bases to shelter in, vehicles to pilot, tools for survival to aid you in navigating and adapting to this subaquatic landscape. ‚Ä¢ DISCOVER - What happened to this planet? What caused you to crash? Can you find a way to make it off the planet alive? ‚Ä¢ CUSTOMIZE - Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE ‚Ä¢ Revamped interface ‚Äì exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control ‚Ä¢ Game Center achievements ‚Ä¢ Cloud Save ‚Äì Share your progress between iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Compatible with MFi controllers ‚Ä¢ iPhone 16 Optimization (including Pro Max) ----- *DEVICES NOT SUPPORTED (THE GAME WON'T WORK)*: - iPhone Xr, iPhone SE Gen 2 (2020) - iPad Mini Gen 5, iPad Air Gen 3, iPad Gen 8, iPad Gen 9 *SUPPORTED DEVICES ON LOW RESOLUTION ONLY*: - iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone SE Gen 3 (2022) - iPad Pro 10.5", iPad Mini Gen 6, iPad Air Gen 4, iPad Gen 10, iPad Pro 11" Gen 1, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 3 *SUPPORTED DEVICES* : - iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 14 AND ABOVE - iPad Pro 11" Gen 2, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 4, iPad Air Gen 5, iPad Pro 11" Gen 3, iPad Pro 11" Gen 4, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 5, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 6 AND ABOVE

entry.title: LP Helper Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

Application Description

"LP Helper Pro" is a permanent professional version of the "LP Helper" App. If you buy this version, you can use all professional functions permanently. "LP Helper Pro" includes four modules: map, on-site 3D compass, on-site AR and detailed information. Map - You can choose any position on the map and calculate the direction of the sun, moon, and the Milky Way at that location. You can also find a suitable location for shooting the starry sky through the light pollution map. In addition, we have added a new weather query function on the map. Now you can query the highly localized weather data of any location within 10 days, including weather, temperature, wind direction, wind speed, humidity, visual distance, cloud coverage and other information, accurate to every hour. 3D compass - calculate the direction of the sun, moon and galaxy at the specified location in the form of a 3D compass. Local AR--Use AR to intuitively estimate the position of the sun, moon and galaxy. This function is very practical to predict the composition in advance at the shooting site. On the AR interface, you can also simulate the star track under the specified exposure time. In this way, you can estimate the shooting time required in advance when taking star track photos. Detailed information -- lists various special moments of the day in the current location, as well as the function of the star calendar. In addition, you can also save the selected locations on the map and add various special moments to the calendar for automatic reminders. The time scroll bar at the bottom can switch between multi-clock modes to switch different time spans and help you select time more accurately. In addition, the App also integrates a variety of practical tools, such as depth-of-view calculator, star point calculator, star orbit calculator, and light brush. Privacy Statement: https://blog.csdn.net/syx151/article/details/143922426? Spm=1001.2014.3001.5501 License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫69,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫69,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

Application Description

Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash ‚Äì cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon! Real factories - made FUN You are the Big Boss and it‚Äôs time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! An open-ended sandbox-experience Take it easy, it‚Äôs a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you‚Äôd like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same. Tiny hands, big dreams Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you‚Äôll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work. Features: - Varying industries and a wide range of products - Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics - Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint - Factories grow as you unlock more desk space - Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle - Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies - Cute model-town art-style

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫54,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫54,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec.
